topics.body:
i found a site that post the sources of album covers

!http://38.media.tumblr.com/188d55b7309b158bab0710c29af00467/tumblr_n1pwitE6UN1su17npo1_r1_1280.jpg!
!http://33.media.tumblr.com/89016fadd54c80ced56395dbf9548299/tumblr_n1pwitE6UN1su17npo2_1280.jpg!

The Roots - Things Fall Apart (1999)

From a photo of riot police chasing black teenagers on the streets of Bedford-Stuyvesant in 1961.

!http://38.media.tumblr.com/325852d2fa6f7cdfbce81d7c75e65d81/tumblr_mnr5p55vTI1su17npo1_400.jpg!
!http://33.media.tumblr.com/f7d1d3b2e1f11efb8f04c7515399829e/tumblr_mnr5p55vTI1su17npo2_500.jpg!
!http://38.media.tumblr.com/99bc79ca9409530a9aba2b74283af0e4/tumblr_myqhosJpt61su17npo1_500.jpg!

Antwon X Lil Ugly Mane - Underwater Tank (2012)

From a photo of a M42 Duster tank stranded underwater

!http://33.media.tumblr.com/b0e24b081954bc5a4dd72c4db135d133/tumblr_myqhosJpt61su17npo2_1280.jpg!
!http://38.media.tumblr.com/57d53a86aa11e563fdf50d736b5b8013/tumblr_mzx0xaH8yb1su17npo1_1280.jpg!
!http://33.media.tumblr.com/bc7a6d23428a304cfeca9f37025ccf38/tumblr_mzx0xaH8yb1su17npo2_1280.jpg!

Dead Kennedys - Plastic Surgery Disasters (1982)

From a photo of a starving boy and a missionary titled “Hands” by Mike Wells

!http://33.media.tumblr.com/cc352b91fea49f032d3cea7fc8d46192/tumblr_mz02lfhXvL1su17npo1_1280.jpg!
!http://33.media.tumblr.com/3361984f757fc29a8c26fd7a0324dba7/tumblr_mz02lfhXvL1su17npo2_500.jpg!

Devo - Q: Are We Not Men? A: We Are Devo! (1978)

From a image of the famous professional golfer Juan “Chi-Chi” Rodríguez found on a golf strap

!http://33.media.tumblr.com/f46bbd20883ef01884ae4d962b15c5d3/tumblr_mzv7whJThS1su17npo1_1280.jpg!
!http://38.media.tumblr.com/e10dae7cf4ca1d0b8b4a8bf0f8c9608a/tumblr_mzv7whJThS1su17npo2_500.jpg!

The Mothers of Invention - Weasels Ripped My Flesh (1970)

From a shaving advertisement in the September 1956 issue of Man’s Life, art by Neon Park
